resources.string: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS nodes ( id INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, timestamp TEXT, lon REAL NOT NULL, lat REAL NOT NULL, grid_id INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT (0) );
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS node_tags_node_id_idx ON node_tags(node_id);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS way_tags_way_id_idx ON way_tags(way_id);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS way_nodes_way_id_idx ON way_nodes(way_id ASC);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS way_nodes_node_id_idx ON way_nodes(node_id ASC);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS relation_tags_rel_id_idx ON relation_tags(relation_id);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS relation_members_rel_id_idx ON members(relation_id);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS grid ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, minLat REAL NOT NULL, minLon REAL NOT NULL, maxLat REAL NOT NULL, maxLon REAL NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS inline_queries (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, query TEXT NOT NULL, [select] TEXT NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS inline_results (query_id INTEGER NOT NULL, value TEXT)
